title: Ledger considering New York IPO or fundraise as demand for hardware wallets climbs: FT
contentSnippet: The hardware wallet manufacturer is having its best year yet, its CEO told the Financial Times, even ahead of an expected holiday season boost in sales.

title: Acting CFTC chair confirms push to launch leveraged spot crypto trading on regulated exchanges
contentSnippet: Spot crypto trading products involving margin, leverage, and financing could launch on regulated exchanges as soon as next month, according to the report.

title: Next Wave of Stablecoin Boom May Seem Invisible, Says Transak CEO
contentSnippet: Transak co-founder and CEO Sami Start said stablecoin adoption will feel increasingly invisible as they are folded into consumer applications.

title: Spanish crypto influencer CryptoSpain detained on $300 million fraud, money laundering charges
contentSnippet: Álvaro Romillo, also known as CryptoSpain, has also reportedly admitted to funding the campaign of a far-right MEP with a €100,000 euro cash donation.

title: What is the Fusaka Upgrade? Ethereum’s Biggest Scaling Bet Yet
contentSnippet: The December 2025 upgrade promises to increase Ethereum's data capacity eightfold, adding tougher defenses, and new developer tools.

title: Bitcoin's $100K Question: Here's Why BTC, XRP, SOL May Surge This Week

title: The 5 Hottest AI-Powered Side Hustles That Actually Seem Plausible
contentSnippet: From "faceless" YouTube channels to AI-generated product demos, 2025’s hottest “hour-a-day” hustles promise easy money—but success still takes testing, luck, and a lot of automation.

title: Crypto Prices Rise as Trump Announces ‘At Least’ $2K Tariff Dividend Per American
contentSnippet: The rally comes after a broader weekly slump, with the CoinDesk 20 (CD20) index recovering from a near 15% drawdown over the week.

title: Wall Street is Bought in On Crypto’s Upside Potential, But Not Its Tech
contentSnippet: Despite record levels of institutional investment, most Wall Street firms are still trading off-chain, says Annabelle Huang, co-founder and chief executive officer of Altius Labs.

title: U.S. Regulator That May Rule Over Digital Assets Pushing Toward Crypto Spot Trading

title: The Great Korean Pivot: From Memecoins to Machine Chips

title: Italy’s banks support ECB’s digital euro plan, but want to spread out costs over time: Reuters

title: ‘Massive overstep’: mistrial declared for ‘MEV Brothers’ accused of $25 million fraud on Ethereum

title: The 'Big Short' Guy Just Bet $1.1 Billion Against AI Giants—And Markets Are Still Absorbing It
contentSnippet: Renowned hedge fund manager Michael Burry disclosed massive bearish positions on AI darlings after warning of market bubbles. The CEO of Palantir was not pleased.

title: Trump Brothers' American Bitcoin Boosts BTC Holdings to $415 Million–Stock Seesaws

title: Privacy Coin Zcash Continues Historic Surge, Nearing 8-Year High Price

title: OpenAI Sought Government Loan Guarantees Days Before Sam Altman's Denial

title: Strategy’s €100 STRE preferred doubles initial target to $715 million, extends bitcoin funding pipeline
